name: FruitMemory
description:
The first game i created, participating in a minijam.

Minijam #54 with following rules:

Theme: Memories

Limitation: The game must start and end as different genres

The game is mostly mouse controlled. In the end you also need the buttons: Q, W, A, S and D.

Mute music with M. Exit early with Escape.

Have fun!
